title: ATP World Tour 250, Lyon Men's Singles Final Rounds and Seeds Progress
text: May 25, 2018 / 1:22 AM / Updated 13 hours ago ATP World Tour 250, Lyon Men's Singles Final Rounds and Seeds Progress Reuters Staff 3 Min Read May 25 (OPTA) - Final Rounds and Seeds Progress from the ATP World Tour 250, Lyon Men's Singles matches on Thursday .. Final Rounds .. Seed Round Rslt Opponent Score - Dusan Lajovic (SRB) qtr won Taylor Fritz (USA) 7-5 6-1 2nd won Filip Horansky (SVK) 6-4 7-5 1st won Horacio Zeballos (ARG) 6-4 6-2 - Taylor Fritz (USA) qtr lost Dusan Lajovic (SRB) 7-5 6-1 2nd won 3-Jack Sock (USA) 7-6(6) 6-2 1st won Matthew Ebden (AUS) 6-4 6-2 - Gilles Simon (FRA) qtr won Mikhail Kukushkin (KAZ) 4-6 6-4 7-6(5) 2nd won Joris De Loore (BEL) 7-6(3) 6-2 1st won Jordi Samper-Montana (ESP) 6-4 6-2 - Mikhail Kukushkin (KAZ) qtr lost Gilles Simon (FRA) 4-6 6-4 7-6(5) 2nd won Federico Coria (ARG) 6-2 6-3 1st won Gregoire Barrere (FRA) 6-2 6-3 - Cameron Norrie (GBR) qtr won 2-John Isner (USA) 7-6(1) 6-4 2nd won Maximilian Marterer (GER) 6-1 6-4 1st won Jose Hernandez-Fernandez 7-6(5) 6-1 (DOM) 2 John Isner (USA) qtr lost Cameron Norrie (GBR) 7-6(1) 6-4 2nd won Radu Albot (MDA) 7-6(3) 6-3 1st won (Bye) .. Seeds .. Seed Round Rslt Opponent Score 1 Dominic Thiem (AUT) qtr to play Guillermo Garcia-Lopez (ESP) (start 11:00) 2nd won Roberto Carballes Baena 6-2 6-4 (ESP) 1st won (Bye) 2 John Isner (USA) qtr lost Cameron Norrie (GBR) 7-6(1) 6-4 2nd won Radu Albot (MDA) 7-6(3) 6-3 3 Jack Sock (USA) 2nd lost Taylor Fritz (USA) 7-6(6) 6-2 1st won (Bye) 5 Adrian Mannarino (FRA) 1st lost Guillermo Garcia-Lopez (ESP) 6-3 4-6 6-1 6 Gael Monfils (FRA) 1st lost Maximilian Marterer (GER) 2-6 6-4 6-4 7 Joao Sousa (POR) 1st lost Filip Horansky (SVK) 6-4 3-6 6-4 (Note : all times are GMT)
